reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's pearl details and find it beautifully made, comfortable, and perfect for bridal events. The material is nicer than expected, and one customer notes it's ideal for hot climates, while another mentions it can be dressed up or down. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some find the size S perfect, others say it runs big. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice cocktail dress
items.body: Soft and comfortable. I wore it to a cocktail party, and it looked great. You can dress it up with jewelry. Read more
items.author: C.MA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Cute!
items.body: I've been eyeing this dress for bridal-related activities and I finally decided to buy it. The fabric is much nicer than I expected and it looks exactly as pictured. Very cute, comfortable, and fits my larger chest quite well. It is a little on the expensive side for being a short dress, but I think it's worth the price. Read more
items.author: Marosa

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a good investment. (See below)
items.body: The media could not be loaded. The poor reviews are accurate on this one, unfortunately. I purchased this dress to wear at my wedding rehearsal dinner because it’s attractive and felt comfortable. THEN I noticed the stains in multiple places. The hem was also poorly done (I’m no seamstress, but even I could tell that it was mass produced with no thought as to how it would look on a human body). I might have kept the dress and tried to wash the questionable stains out (ew) if the hem hadn’t been poorly completed. For $45, it really is a waste of your hard earned money. See pics. Hope this helps someone. Read more
items.author: Morganne Patterson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress for Bride!
items.body: Beautiful dress! I’m personally using this for my bridal shower but would also be super cute for engagement photos or courthouse ceremony. It is oversized so if you want a more fitted look would recommend sizing down. The material of the dress does wrinkle easily so will definitely have to steam every time you wear it. It is not see-thru but not too thick either. I’m 5’4 145lbs and medium fit as pictured, could have sized down to small for more fitted look. Read more
items.author: Katie Taylor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little dress
items.body: The perfect little white pearl dress. I receive so many compliments when wearing it. True to size. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t fit me correctly
items.body: 5’2” 120 lbs small Cute dress but seems to be awkward looking on. Doesn’t lay right. Read more
items.author: Rhonda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING for bridal shower or bridal event
items.body: wearing this for my bridal shower. i sized down and it fits perfectly. it’s sooo cute and i can’t wait to wear it. it’s double layered so it is not see through. it’s so pretty. was a tad wrinkly so i steamed it the other day and it looks like i got it from ma professional dress store ! Read more
items.author: jess

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase
items.body: Ordered this for my daughter’s graduation photos. True to size, great material thickness, price was great. Length was perfect for her 6’2 height. She ordered a large. Read more
items.author: wendy upton

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Silk Blue, White, Apricot, Black and White, Black, Silk Green, Apricot Solid, Silk Black, Light White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
